title: Listening to My Heart
description: ♥ Welcome to Hayden Falls ♥Listening to My Heart ~ Book Five Standing up and doing the right thing didn't end well for me. I defied the one man who held more cards in my life than I realized—my father.I've been publicly disowned, fired, and stripped of everything. My life couldn't get any worse—until it did. My parents and brother took the biggest part of my heart from me. A piece I didn't know existed.After nine years, the woman who holds every piece of my heart comes back to Hayden Falls, bringing a huge secret with her. A secret that shows me what love really means and puts my life back together. This time, no one will keep me from her.♥ Listening to My Heart ♥ is the fifth book in the Hayden Falls series. Get your copy today!
author: Debbie Hyde
